REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0778 reute b f BC-U.K.-MONEY-MARKET-GIV 03-30 0061

TEXT.TITLE: U.K. MONEY MARKET GIVEN 129 MLN STG ASSISTANCE
TEXT.BODY: The Bank of England said it had provided the money market with assistance worth 129 mln stg in the afternoon session. This compares with the Bank's forecast of a shortage in the system today of around 100 mln stg. The central bank purchased 129 mln stg bank bills in band one at 9-7/8 pct. REUTER
